page.title: 12Law and Order (Gwyddelwern)
page.content: Gwyddelwern is a small peaceful village, consisting of a tightly knit community of which in general, all its inhabitants are well known to each other, therefore they respect the other person and their lifestyle. The requirements for internal law and order are thus considerably less than larger communities and are catered for by the local{Police Station at {Corwen,}which is approximately 3 miles away. {The Magistrates Court}is held in {Corwen}twice a month. Solicitors are practicing in the surrounding towns. Mrs Myfanwy Lloyd.
